pages.text: Elasmodectes is a Chimaera known from both the late Jurassic and Early Cretaceous. It had a torpedo like body shape and a single long dorsal spine. This animal was pretty small, reaching lengths around 30 centimeters.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
